# Hibernal Healing (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Cold Spells|cold]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5]], [[4th Level Druid Spells|Druid 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 9]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, Frostfell

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude half (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Frostburn (WotC), pg. 97

You absorb slush, snow, and ice, channeling the cold energy stored within to cure 10 points of damage per caster level, to a maximum of 150 points at 15th level. The spell melts all slush, snow, and ice within 10 feet of the caster.
